pages.text: This entry describes several crafting materials used in Thermal Expansion and Thermal Foundation.

pages.title: Reception Coil
pages.text: The $(item)Redstone Reception Coil$() is used in a wide variety of machines that consume RF.

pages.title: Transmission Coil
pages.text: The $(item)Redstone Transmission Coil$() is used in RF producting machines such as dynamos.

pages.title: Conductance Coil
pages.text: The $(item)Redstone Conductance Coil$() is used in $(item)Power Cells$() and various augments.
